programme.title: Wildest Islands: Caribbean: The Wild Side of Paradise
programme.desc: The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. From just a few meters wide, to hundreds of kilometers across, each of the over 7,000 islands are different, and each has its own unique wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Sri Lanka: Monsoon Island
programme.desc: Lying like a teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention. Poised just six degrees above the equator, it's less than 75,000 km sq in size. But it has enough wildlife to rival a continent.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Falkland Islands: Penguin Paradise
programme.desc: The Falkland's bleak, battered, and windswept archipelago lies 460 km from the South American mainland. Rugged mountains and expansive pristine coastline are a unique home for wildlife  especially for one of the world's most iconic flightless birds.

programme.title: Wildest India: The Himalayas: Surviving the Summits
programme.desc: The Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India. he Himalayas' rugged highlands offer little direct refuge to humans, in the shadow below, over a billion people in India rely on the mountains for survival.

programme.title: Wildest India: India's Lost World
programme.desc: North-east India is an anthropological paradise; there is no other place on Earth with so many different ethnic groups. The forest are filled with mysterious tribes whose lives are dictated by the rain and the seasonal fruits of the forest.

programme.title: Cybermutt

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A New Threat: Part I
programme.desc: A mysterious new threat arrives on the scene in New Domino City, forcing Yusei to take to the streets and track down a rogue Turbo Duelist known as The Ghost.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei must figure out a way to take down Ghost's Meklord Emperor Wisel before Wisel's special ability throws his game and his runner into a tailspin.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Lessons Learned
programme.desc: When Vice Chancellor Rudolph Heitmann threatens to expel all the members of Leo and Luna's class from Duel Academy, Yusei attempts to teach the teacher a valuable lesson by challenging the Vice Chancellor to a duel to keep his friends in school.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Trash Talk
programme.desc: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Duel with Interest
programme.desc: When a loan shark starts sinking his teeth into New Domino City, Jack decides to reel in this money-grubbing menace for good by putting his most prized possessions on the line in a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Wicked Spirits
programme.desc: When Leo and Luna decide to go exploring a nearby forest rumored to be haunted by wicked spirits, they soon discover that the rumors are all too real when a mysterious boy traps Luna in his house and challenges Leo to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: French Twist: Part I
programme.desc: Yusei wakes up to find himself trapped in the back of a big rig with a bump on his head and no way out. After a mysterious tip leads Akiza to Yusei's location, the two friends soon find themselves Turbo Dueling an unfamiliar foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: French Twist: Part II
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Sherry races on, Sherry reveals some shocking secrets about the upcoming World Racing Grand Prix. Meanwhile, Akiza begins to gain a new understanding and appreciation for Turbo Dueling while riding shotgun to Yusei.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Synchro Straits
programme.desc: Before heading out to the event of the year - The World Racing Grand Prix Gala - Yusei challenges Jack to a Turbo Duel in the hopes of finding a new dueling strategy that doesn't involve the use of Synchro Monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Synchro Solution
programme.desc: A mysterious duelist named Vizor offers to show Yusei a new dueling strategy known as The Synchro Solution.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 3

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this special edition of "Fifth Gear," Vicki finds out which iconic TV car is fastest: General Lee from "The Dukes of Hazzard" or the Gran Torino from "Starsky and Hutch.

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 2

programme.title: Fifth Gear: Episode 4

programme.title: Deadly Women: Hearts of Stone
programme.desc: Deadly Women are not always the ones you expect. They are not the strangers lurking in the dark, they are a young mother, a supportive wife and a grandmother - all killers. Behind their loving masquerade lies a wake of family horror and pain.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Behind lace-curtained windows and beneath sensible haircuts lurked evil. Appearances were deceptive. We did not notice these female killers walking by. These women wore a mask of sanity.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: A rifle in a shopping mall, a syringe of potassium chloride and a syringe of insulin, each in the hands of a mentally disturbed woman, lead to the tragic end of many lives.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Judi Buenoano secretly murdered lovers to claim on insurance policies whilst nurse Genene Jones secretly killed at least 46 infants left in her care between 1980 and 1982.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: No one doubts a woman’s capacity to love, but sometimes lust can turn lethal. In the ultimate fatal attraction, "Deadly Women" looks at cases of murder driven by obsessive love.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Crazy Don

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Takeover
programme.desc: Two armed bank robbers hit a Seattle bank taking over 150,000 dollars. Before they can escape police confront them and the pair splits up. As authorities search block by block they learn one was a career criminal with a long history of violence.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Obsession
programme.desc: Power is a responsibility as well as a privilege. But in the wrong hands, power can corrupt. For former Deputy Attorney General for the State of Delaware, losing sight of his sworn oath to uphold justice could prove lethal.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Family Secrets
programme.desc: A woman and her infant son vanish. The husband is frantic. The clues are scarce, but hopes linger, even as the hours and days tick by without a word. Was she on the run, or the victim of foul play?

programme.title: The FBI Files: Hunter's Game

programme.desc: Tucked away in China’s southwest corner is a hidden oasis unlike any other. Snow-capped mountains, temperate valleys and tropical jungles are home to a spectacular array of wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Indonesia
programme.desc: Cloaked in tropical rainforest and warmed by clear blue seas Indonesia is a paradise. Although much of the island chain receives sporadic rain throughout the year, this alone wouldn’t be enough to sustain the region’s rich abundance of life.

programme.title: Wildest Indonesia
programme.desc: How have Indonesia’s remote and mysterious islands become home to so many of the natural world’s most extraordinary giants? From a unique species of elephant, and the world’s longest snake, to a crab almost a metre wide that climbs trees

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals: Kennet and Avon
programme.desc: Dan Jones examines the Kennet and Avon canal.

programme.title: Concorde: Part One
programme.desc: How Concorde became the world's only supersonic airliner.

programme.title: Concorde: Part Two
programme.desc: By the early 1980s, Concorde was admired the world over.

programme.title: London: 2000 Years Of History
programme.desc: Dan Jones discovers the ruins of Roman Londinium.

programme.title: London: 2000 Years Of History
programme.desc: Dr Suzannah Lipscomb enters Henry VIII's pleasure palace.

programme.title: London: 2000 Years Of History
programme.desc: The hosts arrive as the Great Fire almost wipes the city out.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 33
programme.desc: Tonight, teams continue to impress as they bring out their best culinary skills in a difficult challenge. The jury will determine the two weakest teams who will go straight into a sudden death cook-off. Who will buckle under the heat and go home?

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 34
programme.desc: Tonight, things heat up as the competition becomes fiery in the kitchen. Who will cook against who in the semi-finals?

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 35
programme.desc: It's the first round of the semi-finals and two teams must cook their most impressive three-course meal for judges Pete Evans and Manu Feildel, and guest judges Guy Grossi, Tobie Puttock, Liz Egan and Karen Martini

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 36
programme.desc: One team has already earned their place in the all-important grand final and tonight their competitor will be decided. The remaining two teams must cook their most impressive three-course meal

programme.title: The New Detectives: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: Forensic scientists find clues written in blood as they investigate the deaths of three women killed by the men who once loved them.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Scent Of The Kill
programme.desc: A dog can be a dead man's best friend. Dogs have been trained to sniff out corpses, drugs, explosives, and missing persons. They're often the first to find the essential clue that sets an investigation in motion.

programme.title: The New Detectives: True Crime
programme.desc: They know as much about crime as any crime fighter, or any criminal. They're the crime writers, and through their eyes we see murder most foul.

programme.title: The New Detectives: False Witness
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Camera Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Photography: Forensic photographers are among the first people at a crime scene, capturing vital clues on film. What do the cameras capture that can't be seen first-hand, and who are the men and women who analyze the camera's clues?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay presides over the penultimate episode of the US cooking competition as this year's explosive series nears its climax. Three contestants soon become two as Gordon names the second finalist.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay presides over the final episode of the US cooking competition as this year's explosive series reaches its climax. Gordon informs Mary and Ja'Nel that their teams will be creating dishes for two tables of celebrity diners.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twenty aspiring restaurateurs hope to impress Ramsay by present their signature dishes to him. After the opening night dinner service, the least successful contestants face elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Teamwork plays an important role during a relay race in which duos must accomplish basic culinary tasks; while challenge winners go to San Francisco, the losing team picks carrots at a farm; both teams disappoint during dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants learn about teamwork during a challenge involving pigs and potatoes; while the winning team enjoys a day on a yacht, the losers bathe their new livestock friends; a disorganized dinner service leaves chef Ramsay disappointed.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants take part in a team competition involving 10 dishes of lobster ravioli that must be prepared perfectly. The winners earn a swim at a Beverly Hills residence.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a wild 60's inspired show truck. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues on a wild 60's inspired show truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage: Ten Ton Truck
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a vintage military transport truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1929 Ford Roadster Pickup

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1954 Chevy

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel looks back on the Best Builds of season 1

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and his new Commonwealth fleet take on the Drago-Kazov fleet but find it much larger than expected.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog eggs in Harper are starting to hatch, so the team builds a Teseract machine.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Pride And Joy
programme.desc: A feral bull is wreaking havoc at Drovers Run and Tess trades in her cappuccino machine for a daily cow.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: Tess introduces Claire to chat rooms. Jodi finds her mother in bed with Terry. A wild stallion lures Blaze away, and Claire calls the Ryans to help recapture her.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Into The Woods
programme.desc: Feral pigs have attacked Roy as well as sheep and cattle, so Claire, Becky and the Ryans go hunting. Meg feels awkward about having Terry over now that Jodi knows about them.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Haunted
programme.desc: The pain of dealing with loss grips the women of Drovers Run and each are forced to examine events - some old, some new - and find a way to deal with these emotional life-altering events.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: MEG struggles to cope with the reality of JODI’s coming of age and during the ensuing surprise party relationships are put to the test.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: TESS learns the impenetrable rules of what to say and not to say in the country and an innocent remark re opens a very ugly wound, which divides the Ryan brothers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Houghton Hears A Who?
programme.desc: TAPS investigates Houghton Mansionin North Adams, Massachusetts where the repercussions of a deadly car accident could be behind unexplained phenomena on the property.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Coroner's Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Shreveport, Louisiana where the employees and owner of the Rendall Building are experiencing terrifying paranormal activity.

programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Too Many Apparitions in the Kitchen
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the Culinary Institute of America in Hyde Park, New Yorkcalls in TAPS to find out if the spirits of Jesuit priests still roam the areas where they once lived, worked and were buried when it was a seminary.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Ax Men: Take This Log and Shove It
programme.desc: Joe and Coatsey's arguments threaten to bring the job to a grinding halt. Meanwhile at Rygaard, Gabe gives son Aiden a baptism of fire in the rigging, which pushes him to breaking point and raises doubts about his future in the family business.

programme.title: Ax Men: Reunited and It Feels Like Wood
programme.desc: Aiden's mutiny last week, and the burden of finishing the job falls on the shorthanded crew's shoulders.

programme.title: Ax Men: Back In Black
programme.desc: With only two weeks left in the season the Ax Men are sprinting to the finish line.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Log Building for Dummies
programme.desc: Joel pinch hits in Oregon, by building a home he’s never seen before using a crane he hopes he’ll never see again.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Weather or Not
programme.desc: Peter battles the elements to build a retirement home for childhood sweethearts, while Bryan Jr. constructs an entryway for his own sweetheart - wife Tabby.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he can’t keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Island Hopper
programme.desc: When a brother bondsman from Washington State calls Dog for help tracking a runner in search of fun in the sun on the tropical paradise of Kauai, the team gets on the case. Dog's only problem? No leads!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Nice Guys Finish Last
programme.desc: Dog and team help out a bondsman friend whose client jumped bail, but the target is a blank slate. Are his tattoos gang related? Is he likely to be violent? And making matters worse, when they hit his apartment they learn he is moving out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars
programme.desc: While tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland struggles to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Man

programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are stalked by a student who was just released from jail who they haven’t seen since the third grade when he got into trouble because of them. Parody of Brandy’s feature 'I Still Know What You Did Last Summer…'

programme.title: Moesha: A Terrible Thing Happened On My Tour Of College
programme.desc: Moesha and her friends are invited to a college to attend a Prospective Freshman Weekend and someone slips a 'roofie' in her drink. Her boyfriend Aaron keeps her from being taken advantage of.

programme.title: Moesha: Birth Control
programme.desc: Moesha gets birth control pills when she decides she would like to lose her virginity to Aaron. However, things get complicated when Dee finds the pills in her purse.

programme.title: Moesha: A Class Act Christmas
programme.desc: Moesha, Hakeem, and the other employees of the Class Act are held hostage by a man dressed as Santa Claus protesting age discrimination.

programme.title: Moesha: The Crush
programme.desc: A friend of Myles who has a crush on Moesha pretends he cannot read so she can tutor him. However, after an article she writes about the success she has had with the little student is published in the LA Times, Moesha learns a hard lesson.

programme.title: Moesha: Barking Up The Wrong Tree
programme.desc: Hakeem accepts a job as assistant manager of the Class Act claiming there are financial difficulties at home. Moesha, concerned about his college education, confronts his mother who denies his claims.

programme.title: Moesha: Life Imitating Art
programme.desc: Racial tensions mount in Moesha’s high school after a mural depicting Latin American hero Caesar Chavez is purposely defaced.

programme.title: Moesha: OhMiGod, Fanatic
programme.desc: After Moesha and Kim have a huge fight, Moesha is surprised when MTV shows up at her door to film her bringing her best friend Kim to meet her favorite singer. Leanne Rimes guest stars.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Greater London
programme.desc: This week-Kirstie and Phil are in London-with a story of Vicars and Knickers....

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: South East England
programme.desc: One family is stuck in a house bursting at the seams and the other is stuck in one room at mum and dads. It's a quest for space-and it's up to Kirstie and Phil to make these searches blast off.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Exeter
programme.desc: The presenters search for properties near Exeter. Kirstie Allsopp helps a couple spend their £600,000 budget on a rural home with plenty of space and an annexe for wife Nancy's mother.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Windsor Revisit
programme.desc: About two years ago, first time buyers asked us to guide them. I've come back to see whether or not they lived happily.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Sheffield
programme.desc: This week Kirstie and Phil are house hunting in Sheffield. Fire fighter Justin and his sales manager wife Deborah have got £250k burning a hole in their back pocket and they're desperate to find the perfect do-up property to settle down in.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Aberdeen City
programme.desc: Newlyweds Emma and Mike are bursting to move on and up.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Plea
programme.desc: Krystle finds Blake in the mountains and gets him to the hospital. Nick Toscanni disappears. Cecil is also brought to the hospital, and he's very weak. A police investigation is started to find the baby.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Roof
programme.desc: Michael goes to Denver to find out who he is. Alexis and Cecil plan a wedding in the hospital. Claudia disappears and Blake suspects her of kidnapping the baby. There's an exiting drama on the roof of a tall building.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Wedding
programme.desc: The baby is recovered from the real kidnapper, Alfred Grimes, and it turns out he's the father of Roger Grimes. Fallon fires Susan. Claudia leaves for a sanitarium. Fallon starts looking for a job. Blake gives her his hotel La Mirada.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Will
programme.desc: Cecil leaves his estate and Colbyco to Jeff and Alexis. He also reveals his "Rhinewood" game to Blake at the reading of his will. Blake suspects Alexis of being a part of it.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Siblings
programme.desc: Alexis gives her newfound long-lost son Adam a job at Colbyco. Blake starts to believe that Adam may actually be his real son. Fallon and Adam keep flirting with each other, not knowing they are siblings. Adam has dinner with Krystle and Blake.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.81
programme.desc: Woman claims assault while trying to retrieve Glock 23 bought for boyfriend; ex-lover says gun was gift. Children accused of crashing into neighbor's parked vehicle while riding bikes in street.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.49
programme.desc: A teenager is accused of spitting in the face of and taunting another teenager; an angry mother sues after allegedly false charges of assault and battery are filed against her son.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.181
programme.desc: Two 18-year-old girls accused of spray painting each other’s cars trace their alleged vandalism back to high school issues. A 'tickling' incident between young lovers causes a shoulder injury and a dispute over treatment costs.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.230
programme.desc: Judge Judy compares signatures on an allegedly forged contract between ex-friends who are fighting over expensive cosmetology classes. A 19-year-old girl is suing her ex-boyfriend for allegedly stealing her laptop computer.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.194
programme.desc: Jailed during his birthday after being accused of assault and battery while high on drugs, a young man, who was renting a screened-in porch of a mobile home, sues his landlord.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.125
programme.desc: Family disputes details and payment for deceased woman's $19,000 funeral after 15-year cancer battle/Ex-boyfriend sued for unpaid credit card charges in her name; cites father's death and hardships.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.14
programme.desc: Teenagers, romantically linked to the same man, bicker over backstabbing, an assault at a party, and car vandalism.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.191
programme.desc: In a divorce battle, a woman loans $2,000 for legal fees. A karate school owner sues a motorist over a collision impacting business. Teens and moms dispute a traded Ford Mustang's value.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.55
programme.desc: Teen throws house party while dad's away; alleged damages to neighbor's car ensue. Young ex-lovers dispute alleged loan for body-piercing school. Woman sues body-piercing student ex-roommate for unpaid rent.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.228
programme.desc: Car salesman sues ex-girlfriend for default on used car sale; she countersues for illegal repossession. Woman's toddlers taken by children's services, blames ex; he and new girlfriend sue for unpaid loan and false allegations.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.163
programme.desc: A man and his 16-year-old daughter move in with her 20-year-old boyfriend who later sues them for rent and eviction fees; they accuse him of stealing their property.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.115
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of sending explicit photos/Sued for damaging ex-girlfriend's Mustang in accident.

programme.title: CBS Mornings
programme.desc: Reporting on international news stories, interviews, and in-depth pieces, covering topics from news, sports, climate and technology to race, health, parenting and personal finance.

programme.title: CBS Mornings Plus
programme.desc: CBS Mornings Plus" is produced by the award-winning "CBS Mornings" team and takes viewers deeper into the most important headlines of the day, as well as pop culture, entertainment, health, wellness and financial news.

programme.title: CBS News Sunday Morning
programme.desc: News, features, weather and commentary.

programme.title: Here Comes the Sun
programme.desc: Taking a closer look at some of the people, places, and things brought to viewers every weekend.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Keri Russell
programme.desc: Keri Russell and Bear journey through the Canary Islands; they dine on undigested seeds from a pigeon carcass, use a grappling hook and make a daring escape from a mountain peak using a paraglider; Keri discusses her family and path to fame.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Marshawn Lynch
programme.desc: Bear and Super Bowl champion Marshawn Lynch tackle a rugged mountain range that has sharp cliffs and dark chasms; the pair comes face to face with the French Foreign Legion and pursues a wild hog for dinner.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Tamron Hall's tenacious personality shines through as Bear pushes her to her limits.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, James Marsden
programme.desc: X-man' James Marsden joins Bear on an adventure into the heart Rattle Snake Canyon in Utah, where they helicopter on to one of the highest arches in the area.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
programme.desc: Bear and Joseph Gordon-Levitt navigate Kenya's unyielding terrain; Joseph and Bear navigate a perilous rappel, milk a camel for hydration, ascend a massive rock dome and battle a crocodile for dinner; Joseph talks about his family and rise to fame.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Drew Brees
programme.desc: Bear Grylls ventures deep into Panama's Camino de Cruces jungle with Super Bowl winning quarterback Drew Brees, exploring caves and wrestling a six-foot crocodile.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: Arthur: Love Notes For Muffy/D.W. Blows The Whistle
programme.desc: When Muffy tries to bribe the judges at the school science fair, Francine and The Brain plot revenge. And D.W., a newly-deputized Junior Safety Officer, has a reputation for being a strict enforcer of the rules--well, OK, a tattle-tale.

programme.title: Arthur: Do You Speak George?/World Girls
programme.desc: Everyone at school is speaking their own made-up language, and George can't make sense of what anyone is saying. And it's the grand opening of World Girl World, which sells dolls from every country, and every girl in town is thrilled!

programme.title: Arthur: Phony Fern/Brain's Shocking Secret
programme.desc: When Fern's parents give her a cell phone for emergencies, she soon becomes hooked on it. Brain is the smartest kid in class. Everyone knows that! What they don't know is that he was kept back in Kindergarten. Will Binky spill the beans?

programme.title: Arthur: Mr. Ratburn's Secret Identity/Besties
programme.desc: Mysterious calls. Superhuman strength. Is Mr. Ratburn secretly a superhero? When Buster and Ladonna bond over a memorable trip to the movies, Arthur feels left out. Has Ladonna taken his place as Buster's best bud?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Spaces Out/The Long Road Home
programme.desc: Inspired by footage of the moon landing, Buster wants to go to outer space someday! For now, it'd be cool to build and launch a rocket! Then, after costing Lakewood Elementary the win in a relay race, George wants to redeem himself.

programme.title: Arthur: The Last of Mary Moo Cow/Bitzi's Beau
programme.desc: When Mary Moo Cow is cancelled, D.W. is devastated. How can television--or life as she knows it--ever be the same? Buster hasn't yet met Bitzi's new boyfriend, but he fears the worst. What if he is a Mom-stealer?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Babysits/Arthur's Cousin Catastrophe
programme.desc: You think running a marathon is hard? Try babysitting for the Terrible Tibble Twins. Next, Arthur's family is hosting the once-a-year-is-more-than-enough family reunion. But a major thunderstorm turns this into a reunion to remember.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Thinks Big/Arthur Cleans Up
programme.desc: Once again, Arthur gets to do everything. Mostly he gets to carry the ring in Aunt Lucy's wedding. Elwood City's park is in sad shape, and after grumbling about it, the kids find themselves volunteered to clean it up.

programme.title: Arthur: Hide And Snake/Muffy's New Best Friend
programme.desc: The kids capture a snake and learn that it's possibly poisonous--after it gets lost in Arthur's house! Why is Muffy interviewing for a new best friend? She and Francine are usually inseparable, but lately it seems they have less in common.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Herbert Cukurs
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Israeli secret service agents traveled to South America to assassinate Nazi war criminal Herbert Cukurs. Known as the Hangman of Riga, Cukurs was responsible for the deaths of over 30,000 Latvian Jews.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: Hitler's Killer Police
programme.desc: In Ukraine and Lithuania, Nazi invaders were welcomed as liberators. In Lithuania, Antanas Gecas led a militia that executed hundreds of Jews. Ukrainian nationalists participated in pogroms slaughtering 34,000 Jews in two days.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The Good Collaborators?
programme.desc: Finland defended itself in the Winter War under Marshal Mannerheim. Finland allied with Nazi Germany against the Soviet Union in 1941. Finland later negotiated peace with the Allies and switched sides as Nazi defeat became apparent.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The Dutch Collaborator
programme.desc: Anton Adriaan Mussert, initially resisted Hitler’s anti-Semitism despite modeling his NSB party, even welcoming Jewish members. His failed attempt to kidnap Queen Wilhelmina led him into hiding, after which he collaborated in hopes of gaining power.

programme.title: NEW: Nazi Collaborators: The Jews Who Fought for Hitler
programme.desc: In Hitler’s Germany, those with Jewish ancestry faced harsh Nuremberg Laws. Full Jews faced death; Mischlinge endured discrimination, job bans. Some, like Helmut Schmidt, unaware of heritage, found protectors like Milch in high places.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Danny is intent on building a life with his online love, despite her violent past. But when he enlists Nev and Max to help him meet her, they discover she may have ties to a former Catfish! (S6, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ramon & Paola
programme.desc: Ramon met Paola on Facebook and established an exclusive online relationship. But after many failed attempts to video chat, is she really who he thinks she is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After being Catfished by her best friend, Larissa turned to online pal Anthony for support. Feelings between them grew, but after some suspicious moves, Larissa is worried he is also lying. (S5, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Artis & Jess
programme.desc: Five months ago Artis met Jess online. Artis and Jess each were in relationships, but believed they'd found true love. But is Jess everything that she says she is?

programme.title: The City: Friends In High Places
programme.desc: Kelly pushes Whitney to market her line after her first fashion show. Olivia refuses to support Whitney's line at ELLE Magazine, but Erin goes over her head to Joe Zee. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: The City: Professionally Dangerous
programme.desc: Whitney and Olivia go head-to-head after Olivia decides to interview her friend for ELLE, instead of covering Whitney's line. Roxy goes out with Zach. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Queen Of Diamonds
programme.desc: Olivia &amp; Erin have different ideas of how to dress Fergie for an ELLE cover shoot, leaving Joe Zee in the middle. A French photographer is interested in Whitney, but she's unsure. (S2, ep4)

programme.title: The Hills: Truth And Time Tells All / Meet The Parents
programme.desc: Now she's decided to give Justin a second chance, Audrina wants Lauren to get to know her boy better. She invites Lauren to drinks, and Lauren agrees, despite being apprehensive. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: The Hills: Rolling With The Enemy / Second Chances
programme.desc: After Justin's disappearing act at Brody's barbeque on the last episode, Lauren thought Audrina's days with the bad boy were over. (S3, ep5)

programme.title: The Hills: They Meet Again / For Better Or Worse
programme.desc: Lauren and Jason have been spending a lot of time together lately, but while at lunch, Jason lets it slip that not only does he have a girlfriend, but they're moving in together! (S3, ep8)

programme.title: The City: The Belle of Elle
programme.desc: Whitney brings Roxy to a Glamour magazine shoot, despite Kelly's advice, and it almost ends in disaster. Erin &amp; Olivia compete to be featured in New York's biggest gossip column. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: The City: Fashion With A Capital F
programme.desc: Olivia refuses to wear a designer's clothes to their own party, which angers some. Whitney shows Joe Zee her line &amp; gets some harsh criticism. Erin eyes a replacement for Olivia. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Teenage Terrors
programme.desc: Six days into 2004, an unidentified man is found stabbed to death just outside of the booming oil city of Calgary, Alberta. Just when the police appear to have no leads, a witness comes forward.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Backpacker Killer
programme.desc: In the early 1990s, the tourist hotspot of New South Wales, Australia became a place of fear when backpackers started going missing.

programme.title: Crime Stories: David Snow: The House Hermit
programme.desc: A young Vancouver woman is tied to a tree and sexually assaulted for 9 straight days just yards away from the busiest highway in Canada.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Killing Cousins
programme.desc: On July 26, 1983, police in Vero Beach, Florida received a report of a nude man firing shots at a naked girl on a residential street.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Homocidal Drifter
programme.desc: In the city of Moncton, New Brunswick police discover the bodies of Joan Hicks and her 11-year-old daughter, Nina ‚Äì both brutally murdered late in the night.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 6
programme.desc: There's a report of a stabbing for Birmingham's biker paramedics. In Essex, a driver tries to sweet talk his way out of trouble.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 3
programme.desc: In this week’s episode, Bristol biker paramedic Wingnut has a tough case on his hands. A woman is stuck in the mud on the banks of the river Avon.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 6
programme.desc: In Portsmouth biker paramedic there’s a shocking case for Allan which will demand more than just medical know-how. And a cyclist’s memory loss is worrying in the aftermath of an accident.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 9
programme.desc: The emergency bikers race to help a Birmingham toddler who’s in agony after a nasty fall and a woman struggling to breathe in Oxford. In Essex, biker cop Lucy Watson finds herself on the end of a charm assault and in North Yorkshire.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 5
programme.desc: Dr Nick Mani receives a critically ill one-day-old baby.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 8
programme.desc: The staff and patients of Barnsley's A&E department are put under the microscope.

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.

programme.title: Scorpion: Crazy Train
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must stop a sabotaged runaway subway train with Paige and Ralph on board. Also, in his attempt to impress Happy, Toby has his first boxing match.

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer.

programme.title: Scorpion: Arrivals And Departures
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion and Walter's parents visit Megan in the hospital as her health deteriorates, they are quarantined after a deadly fungus outbreak threatens to infect everyone.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: Human Error, Part 1
programme.desc: The Autobots and the Elite Guard pursue Wasp for their own agenda. However, Blackarachnia has Swoop capture Wasp in her latest attempt to rid herself of her organic half. This experiment goes awry and turns Wasp into Waspinator.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: Human Error, Part 2
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Optimus Prime patrols the city in search of Soundwave. With Porter C. Powell selling Soundwave action figures, Optimus is paranoid that the real Soundwave is out there.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: Decepticon Air
programme.desc: It turns out that Soundwave has trapped the Autobots in a virtual reality. Now, Sari must free them before Soundwave completely turns them into Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: This Is Why I Hate Machines
programme.desc: In an effort to speed up their return to Cybertron, Sentinel Prime has Jazz pilot the Elite Guard ship through a space storm. The storm's energies reactivate Swindle, who frees his fellow Decepticon prisoners, and the group goes on to take over the ship.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: Endgame, Part 1
programme.desc: A TransWarp accident with the Space Bridge sends Ratchet and Captain Fanzone to Cybertron, where Sentinel Prime has the planet on high alert. They soon end up stumbling upon a plot by Shockwave to steal Omega Supreme's Access Codes from Arcee.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: Endgame, Part 2
programme.desc: The Autobots discover Omega Supreme's energy signal on the Moon. Rachet insists on going there right away to save him, but Prime refuses, knowing that they are too weak to fight Megatron.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: First Encounter
programme.desc: During the war on Cybertron, the Mini-Cons, mini-transformers who can be used as upgrades by their bigger brethren, crash lands on Earth. In present day, a group of children finds their ship by accident which brings the war to Earth.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Escaping from the confrontation between Bots and Cons, Alex, Rad and Carlos find the cargo hold of the Exodus underground and are adopted by three minicons. Retreating to the moon, the 'Cons make the wreck of the Exodus there their base.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Base
programme.desc: Alexis, Rad and Carlos introduce themselves to Optimus Prime, Hot Rod and First Aid, and get a condensed history of the conflict. Meanwhile, on the moon, Megatron plots to capture the minicons that are now appearing all over earth.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Comrade
programme.desc: The children join the Autobot team and head out on their first mission to find a newly waking minicon. The Decepticons arrive to combat them. Optimus Prime finds his old minicon partner.

programme.title: Survivorman: Colorado Rockies
programme.desc: Out for a casual day's ride, Les (and horses) have to survive temperatures that vary from 70°F in the day to snow flurries at night.

programme.title: Survivorman: Patagonia

programme.title: Survivorman: Grenada Jungle
programme.desc: Les treks through the thick mountain rainforest to survive on the peak of Grenada's largest active mountain. Mona Monkeys, tarantulas, scorpions, armadillo, parrots and possums all live in this vibrant ecosystem, offering an abundance of food and danger.

programme.title: Survivorman: Alaska
programme.desc: As Stroud enters an ocean bay called "Taroka Arm" by sea kayak, there's only about four hours of twilight per day and he knows that Mother Nature is going to wreak havoc upon his internal clock.

programme.title: Survivorman: Mystery of Bigfoot Mountain
programme.desc: Les ventures into the most remote and dangerous grizzly bear territory of the Canadian Rockies in his search for Sasquatch. In this vast and unexplored forest, anything could be out there. Can Les capture definitive proof of Bigfoot?

programme.title: Survivorman: Tonga
programme.desc: Les strands himself on a deserted island in the archipelago of Tonga with a long-time friend to relive the story of marooned sailors.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A murder victim's final moments are caught on tape. The crime scene looks like a clear robbery-murder. Text evidence at first points to a jilted lover who has an alibi which needs checking.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A 20-year-old woman sets out on her bike and never returns. Her body is found a few miles from her house, with a gunshot wound to the head. Eventually modern technology breaks the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The mysterious murder of a young teacher's aide leaves a big hole in her small community. Generations of investigators and a scientific breakthrough leads to a shocking end to a tragic case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A building manager finds the lifeless body of a young woman in her first apartment. The case goes cold, then a new forensic tool examines the old evidence. Will science crack the case?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A single mum looking for love vanishes without a trace. Foul play is confirmed when a large pickup truck toolbox opens to her body stuffed inside. Can forensic evidence connect the dots?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Navy lieutenant Lee Hartley is murdered while deployed out to sea. Investigators discover Lee had enemies aboard the ship, but it takes years before they discover what really happened.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A mortally wounded woman crawls to call 911. Her husband gets a hard look from police, but claims to have an airtight alibi. The intricate forensic science of ballistics is brought to bear.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Deeply religious Gail Fulton is shot execution style in the quiet suburbs of Michigan. Surveillance reveals it was a trio of killers. Eventually, detectives get a break: a handwritten note.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In 1990, three sex workers are murdered. A serial killer was on the loose and detectives had few clues. Over 20 years later there's a break in the case - and an arrest is finally made.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A morning house fire kills the only doctor in the small town of Laeger, West Virginia. An investigation quickly leads to the arrest of Jason Lively, the son of the doctor's long-time nurse.

programme.desc: Bob and the gang are replacing some old pipes outside the town hall. Molly, meanwhile, is practicing for her first aid exam with a reluctant JJ as guinea pig. When Wendy calls JJ’s yard to order a special pipe and Molly offers to deliver it.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Three extraterrestrials who pose a serious threat to humanity target Shalimar, so the team sets out to save her from their evil clutches.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A disembodied mutant takes over the bodies of various people and sets out to go after the ones who did this to him. One of them is a doctor that Shalimar likes.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: While on a job, Shalimar is injured and is helped by another feral mutant, Nikki, whom she knew and was almost chosen for the team. While Shalimar recuperates, she offers to fill in.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan's shady ex-girlfriend turns to him for help when her latest scam takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team faces its most dangerous mission yet: stopping a group of eco-terrorists.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan is upset with Adam, who tells him that he was entrusted to keep a secret and leaves after talking to that person. The man is looking for someone and is willing to kill anyone to get to that person.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Interview
programme.desc: Zo'or agrees to do a live television interview to try to endear himself to humans, but the show's producer has an ulterior motive in getting him in front of a camera.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keep Your Enemies Closer
programme.desc: The shuttle Liam and Zo'or are in crashes over wilderness, but survive in safety bubbles. The people they meet live off the earth and know nothing of the Taelons. However, Zo'or is injured and missing a Synod meeting on the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Subterfuge
programme.desc: Sandoval has a mole attempting to gain information about Liam - particularly concerning his commitment to the Taelons. When a Taelon and protector are killed in a portal that malfunctions, Liam is suspicious that it was intentional.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Bombings begin at embassies and Liam believes they may reignite the SI (Sino-Indian) War, which ended with an armistice several years before. An old intelligence agency friend of Renee's has interesting holographic technology.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Liam Kincaid races against the clock to find Zo'or, who disappears after contracting an ancient Taelon virus that has the potential to cause a devastating plague.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through Your Eyes
programme.desc: Zo'or kidnaps a comatose policeman in order to use the man's body as a 'vessel' in a consciousness transfer experiment that will allow him to 'test' the human survival instinct and cause havoc on Earth.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Source
programme.desc: With all of Lost World thirsting for water, the explorers are attacked by raptors. They are aided by a young woman, Ana, and Marguerite becomes interested in her knowledge of the Fountain of Youth.

programme.title: The Lost World: Trophies
programme.desc: A hunting party arrives on the plateau and takes fire at a Troglodyte child. Though they claim to be there to bring them home, Veronica becomes the target of their gunfire and snares.

programme.title: The Lost World: Voodoo Queen
programme.desc: An alluring stranger named Danielle seeks aide from Roxton and the others after her village is taken by Trogs. But when the woman uses a voodoo doll to bewitch Roxton, the group must rescue her.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Guardian
programme.desc: Challenger is trapped and taken to a village of orphans, protected by dense jungle and a plant that feeds on fresh meat. Marguerite and Veronica must help Challenger escape before they are killed.

programme.title: The Lost World: Under Pressure
programme.desc: A handsome stranger stumbles onto the plateau and becomes close with the explorers. While he gains the attention of Marguerite and Veronica, Challenger's electrostatic accumulator is targeted.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Roxton and Marguerite discover a way through the mountain and explore the fissure in hopes of finding a way off the plateau. Instead, they discover an English town and trouble with the locals.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder at Sea?
programme.desc: The disappearance of newlywed George Smith, who vanished from a cruise in the Mediterranean. This report uncovers the questionable alibis, failed polygraphs and a provocative video that involves the three men who last saw Smith alive.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Last Confession
